trans-unit.source: adafruit-nrfutil is a Python package that includes the adafruit-nrfutil command line utility and the nordicsemi library.
trans-unit.target: adafruit-nrfutil 是一个Python软件包，其中包括 adafruit-nrfutil 命令行实用程序和 nordicsemi 库。

trans-unit.source: Create self-contained binary
trans-unit.target: 创建自足的二进制

trans-unit.source: If you get permission errors when running pip3 install, your pip3 is older or is set to try to install in the system directories. In that case use the --user flag:
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行 pip3 install 时遇到权限错误，则说明您的 pip3 较旧或设置为尝试在系统目录中安装。在这种情况下，请使用 --user 标志：

trans-unit.source: If you want to install in system directories (generally not recommended):
trans-unit.target: 如果你想安装在系统目录下(一般不推荐)。

trans-unit.source: Installation
trans-unit.target: 安装

trans-unit.source: Installing from PyPI
trans-unit.target: 从PyPI安装

trans-unit.source: Installing from Source
trans-unit.target: 从源头安装

trans-unit.source: Note: following commands use python3, however if you are on Windows, you may need to change it to python since windows installation of python 3.x still uses the name python.exe
trans-unit.target: 注意：以下命令使用 python3 ，但是，如果您在Windows上，则可能需要将其更改为 python ,因为Windows在安装python 3.x时仍使用名称python.exe

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: 先决条件

trans-unit.source: Python 3 version of Nordic Semiconductor nrfutil utility and Python library (modified by Adafruit)
trans-unit.target: Nordic Semiconductor nrfutil实用程序和Python库的Python 3版本(由Adafruit修改)。

trans-unit.source: Python3
trans-unit.target: Python3

trans-unit.source: Run the following commands to make adafruit-nrfutil available from the command line or to development platforms like the Arduino IDE or CircuitPython:
trans-unit.target: 运行以下命令以从命令行或Arduino IDE或CircuitPython等开发平台使 adafruit-nrfutil 可用：

trans-unit.source: The executable nrfutil has been renamed to adafruit-nrfutil to distinguish it from the original executable.
trans-unit.target: 可执行文件 nrfutil 已重命名为 adafruit-nrfutil ,以将其与原始可执行文件区分开。

trans-unit.source: This is recommended method, to install latest version
trans-unit.target: 这是推荐的方法,安装最新的版本

trans-unit.source: This library is written for Python 3.5+. It is no longer Python 2 compatible!
trans-unit.target: 这个库是为Python 3.5+编写的。它不再与Python 2兼容

trans-unit.source: This package is derived from the Nordic Semiconductor ASA package pc-nrfutil, version 0.5.3. The code has been converted from Python 2 to Python 3.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包派生自Nordic Semiconductor ASA软件包 pc-nrfutil 0.5.3版。该代码已从Python 2转换为Python 3。

trans-unit.source: This tool can be used with the Adafruit nRF52 Feather to flash firmware images onto the device using the simple serial port.
trans-unit.target: 该工具可与Adafruit nRF52 Feather 一起使用，以使用简单的串行端口将固件映像刷新到设备上。

trans-unit.source: To convert an nRF52 .hex file into a DFU pkg file that the serial bootloader can make use of:
trans-unit.target: 将 nRF52 .hex 文件转换为 DFU pkg 文件,以便于串行引导程序使用。

trans-unit.source: To flash a DFU pkg file over serial:
trans-unit.target: 要通过串口闪存DFU pkg文件。

trans-unit.source: To generate a self-contained executable binary of the utility (Windows and MacOS), run these commands:
trans-unit.target: 要生成该实用程序的独立可执行二进制文件(Windows 和 MacOS),请运行这些命令。

trans-unit.source: To get info on the usage of adafruit-nrfutil:
trans-unit.target: 要获得关于adafruit-nrfutil的使用信息。

trans-unit.source: To install in user space in your home directory:
trans-unit.target: 要安装在主目录的用户空间。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have issue installing with PyPi or want to modify the tool. First clone this repo and go into its folder.
trans-unit.target: 如果你在安装PyPi时遇到问题或想修改工具,请使用这个方法。首先克隆这个repo,进入它的文件夹。

trans-unit.source: You will find the .exe in Adafruit_nRF52_nrfutil\nordicsemi\dist\adafruit-nrfutil ( with .exe if you are on windows). Copy or move it elsewhere for your convenience, such as directory in your %PATH%.
trans-unit.target: 您将在 Adafruit_nRF52_nrfutil\nordicsemi\dist\adafruit-nrfutil 找到该.exe （如果在Windows上则为 .exe ）。为了方便起见，将其复制或移动到其他位置，例如％PATH％中的目录。

trans-unit.target: adafruit-nrfutil
